    Hi there!

    I'm Vig Venkat.
    I live in Hong Kong.
    I work as a Senior Software Engineer. At work, I mostly do Backend Engineering.

    I love Technology and Music.
    I'm currently learning both Indian classical singing (carnatic) and Western Piano

    In free time, I compose new music here - AnEmptyBoatMusicProductions
